leather@village.name: leather
leather@village.desc[0]: A suit of leather armor lies here.

beer@village.desc[1]: There is a draught beer on the counter here.
beer@village.name: beer
beer@village.examine: Looks like cheap, run of the mill draught beer.
beer@village.desc[0]: Someone has thoughtlessly left a draught beer here.

map@village.name: map
map@village.examine: Jetty: east, east, east; south, east; north, east: Beach
map@village.desc[0]: A worn and battered old treasure map lies torn and tattered before you.

bread@village.name: bread
bread@village.desc[0]: A freshly-baked loaf of bread is here.

sack@village.desc[1]: A very large sack has been left here. The sack is closed.
sack@village.name: sack
sack@village.desc[0]: A very large sack has been left here.

boat@village.name: boat
boat@village.desc[0]: A small rowing boat has been left here.

silvercoins@village.name: silvercoins
silvercoins@village.desc[0]: A large pile of silver coins sits here.

sheets@village.name: sheets
sheets@village.desc[0]: Some sheets lie strewn on the floor.

fire@village.name: fire
fire@village.desc[0]: A huge fire burns in the center of the room.

gates2@village.name: gates2
gates2@village.examine:
The gates are a constant reminder of how the world was before it was ruled
by the Masters of this world. Nowadays they are a tourist attraction.
gates2@village.desc[0]: The gates of the village are open.

silk@village.name: silk
silk@village.desc[0]: A bale of valuable silk has been dropped here.

flag@village.name: flag
flag@village.desc[0]: An old Jolly Roger flag has been left here, carefully folded.

box@village.desc[1]: A closed safety deposit box has been left here.
box@village.name: box
box@village.desc[0]: A safety deposit box has been left here.

money@village.name: money
money@village.desc[0]: A large bundle of money is here.

pen@village.name: pen
pen@village.desc[0]: A small gold biro is here.

oar@village.name: oar
oar@village.desc[0]: A single oar from a boat lies here.

poker@village.name: poker
poker@village.examine:
This poker looks a bit more dangerous than a card game, and it appears to be
slightly bent from meeting various adventurers' heads with force!
poker@village.desc[0]: A heavy iron poker has been left here.

leggings@village.name: leggings
leggings@village.examine:
Dirty and worn, these tattered scraps of fabric just might keep your
legs warm.
leggings@village.desc[0]: A pirate's old pair of leggings has been dropped here.

jug@village.name: jug
jug@village.examine: This jug is shaped somewhat like a stout man with a cocked hat for the brim.
jug@village.desc[0]: A large toby jug has been left here, its face a hideous grin.

desk@village.name: desk
desk@village.desc[0]: The manager's desk is here covered with papers.

bed@village.name: bed
bed@village.desc[0]: The barman's bed lies here, it doesn't appear to have been slept in.

rat@village.name: rat
rat@village.desc[0]: A dead rat lies rotting on the floor before you.

barrel@village.desc[1]: A large wooden barrel squats in a corner.
barrel@village.name: barrel
barrel@village.desc[0]: An open wooden barrel stands before you.

bot_boards@village.name: Bot_Boards
bot_boards@village.desc[0]:
The floorboards above you have been lifted, to allow access to some kind of
room above.

gates1@village.name: gates1
gates1@village.examine:
The gates are a constant reminder of how the world was before it was ruled
by the Masters of this world. Nowadays they are a tourist attraction.
gates1@village.desc[0]: The gates of the village are open.

pebble@village.name: pebble
pebble@village.desc[0]: A bored pebble sits at your feet, philosophising.

knife@village.name: knife
knife@village.desc[0]: A small filleting knife has been left here carelessly.

top_boards@village.name: Top_Boards
top_boards@village.desc[0]:
One of the floorboards has been lifted, allowing access down under the cellar,
to some kind of passage.

raft@village.name: raft
raft@village.desc[0]: A small wooden raft has been dumped here.

bell@village.name: bell
bell@village.desc[0]:
A huge brass ships bell has been placed here, its gleaming surface evidently
well polished.

donut@village.name: donut
donut@village.desc[0]: A freshly-baked donut covered in chocolate icing is here.

batten@village.name: batten
batten@village.desc[0]: A small solid batten is here.

vault2@village.title: Vault
vault2@village.description:
Luckily the vault itself is open. You enter a small, dull room
made completely of steel. There are many shelves, and lockable drawers
lining the walls.

chamber@village.title: Dim Chamber
chamber@village.description:
You are standing in a dim, and secret chamber deep underground.  Narrow
rough passages lead west and south.

inn_yard@village.title: Inn Yard
inn_yard@village.description:
You are standing in the yard of the Old Seadog Inn.  The inn itself stands
to the east, a battered structure half timbered and sagging, with that pleasant
atmosphere of ages.  To the north a narrow gateway leads back onto the road.

road7@village.title: Main Street
road7@village.description:
Standing in Main street, there is a bank to the north, the enterance to a
park is to the west, and the back of the boat shed is to the south.

behind@village.title: Behind The Bar
behind@village.description:
You are standing behind the bar of the 'Old Seadog'.  The bar surface is
worn and pitted from years and years of heavy use.  Names are carved into its
surface, 'Black Sea Pete', 'Grey Hook', 'Moog The Kipper', no doubt some of the
pirates who long ago made this their haunt.
   A narrow stairway leads down, and a small room can be seen through a low
doorway to the east.

village45@village.title: The Village Gates
village45@village.description:
You are standing in the opening of the village gates. Many adventurers
before made the step outside. An unknown number of them aren't around any
more to tell their story. The gates used to be heavily guarded, but it has
been a while now since the gates were closed. To the east you can enter
the village marketplace while to the west a path leads into the forest.
  Just outside the gates you can go south to a rough patch of land to the
south of the village.

seadog@village.title: The Old Seadog
seadog@village.description:
You are standing in the 'Old Seadog' inn.  The inn radiates age and charm,
with its oak beam roof, and many seafaring momentos secured firmly around the
walls.  Even the bar is a single thick oak slab, worn and chipped with years of
service to rowdy sailors.
   The door out is west.

road8@village.title: Main Street
road8@village.description:
You see an armory to the East and a weapons shop to the West.  The Main
street continues to the north and south.

slanted@village.title: Slanted Tunnel
slanted@village.description:
You are clambering down a fairly wide earthen passage which descends from a
junction of passages towards a turning of some sort.  The dirt floor is hard,
as if heavy objects have passed this way many times.

road2@village.title: Village Road
road2@village.description:
You are following the narrow main street of the village which leads east and
west.  To the south, the worn sign of the Old Seadog Inn flaps quietly in the
wind.

villlearn@village.title: Sam's Strength Center
villlearn@village.description:
This is the lobby of a gym, as sounds and odor attest.  There are people
working out nearby.  That looks kind of like Sam over behind the counter,
but it's not Sam; must be his brother.  Well "&+Clearn info&*" will tell you
what he's offering here.

cove@village.title: Secret Cove
cove@village.description:
You are standing in a secret cove surrounded by high black crags.  A narrow
 cavemouth leads west into darkness. The rocks and pounding surf along the shore
here makes launching boats well nigh impossible.

vault1@village.title: Before the Vault
vault1@village.description:
At the bottom of the stairs you enter a small, cold steel walled 
chamber. There is a single door in the north wall made of thick steel
bars.

bank@village.title: The Bank
bank@village.description:
This is only a small bank, the village has yet to grow sufficiently
to support anything larger. The counter is on the western side of the bank
behind which lies the managers office. There is a set of stairs leading 
down.

well2@village.title: Down The Well
well2@village.description:
You are hanging part of the way down the village well, looking upwards
towards the light above.  The well descends further but it gets very slippery.
A narrow passage leads east into absolute darkness.

jetty@village.title: The Jetty
jetty@village.description:
You stand on the jetty, looking east across the waves.  A path leads west
along the jetty back to the village.

road4@village.title: Main Street
road4@village.description:
You are at an intersection in the village road. To the north you can see
some shops, amongst which there is what looks like a weapons shop. The west
leads to accommodation, the bank and some other stores, while to the south
is the older part of the village.

narrow@village.title: Narrow Tunnel
narrow@village.description:
You are clambering down a narrow tunnel which slopes downwards and east
turning from the south.  From the east you can smell the sea and hear the sound
of waves against the shore...

village44@village.title: The Village Market
village44@village.description:
You are standing on a large square near the village gates. On special
days this square is completely filled with merchants selling their
products. In the middle of the square a very old oak provides some shadow
from the sun. To the east the square changes into the village green. To
the west you can see the old gates that protected the village from the
evils of the forest.

barman@village.title: Barman's Room
barman@village.description:
You are crouched in the barman's small, and very personalized room.  The
walls have a large collection of battered naval memorabilia fastened securely
to them.  Indeed, even the lone window is a porthole, giving the room that
distinctive sea-cabin look.  A single low doorway leads west into the inn
proper.

locksmith@village.title: Locksmith's
locksmith@village.description:
This run down little building apparently serves as a shop for the
local locksmith. The air smells of dust, and something rotting. Looking
round you are unable to find the source of the smell, but understand
why no one comes in here.

alley@village.title: Narrow Alley
alley@village.description:
You are standing in a narrow alleyway which deadends to the south.  The
alley is dark and dismal and is simply a walled passage down to a small well
which appears to serve the village itself.

road1@village.title: Village Road
road1@village.description:
You are following a narrow dirt road which leads east into the village.  To
the north a track leads into a small yard of some sort, to the south it leads
down a narrow walled alley to the village well.

yard@village.title: Yard
yard@village.description:
You are in a small walled dirt yard in the village.  Various large pieces of
rotten fishing netting lie all around you, and the yard stinks with the smell
of rotting fish, a scent which seems to draw thousands of sea birds flapping
around you.

shore@village.title: Village Shore
shore@village.description:
You stand on the sea shore, to the east of the village. A narrow jetty leads
east out into the waves.  The road also leads westwards back into the center of
the village.

office@village.title: Manager's office
office@village.description:
Entering a well decorated room, you see a large book shelf, filled
with interesting titles, several chairs and a window looking out into
some trees.

armory@village.title: Armory
armory@village.description:
Looking around this shop, you see piles of useless armor. The time
it would take to look through it all for something useful you decide
isn't worth it.

cellar@village.title: Cellars
cellar@village.description:
You are stooped down low, in the cellars of the 'Old Seadog'.  The room is
dark and shadowy lit only by a pale light from high above at the top of the
steps.  The room stinks of cheap ale and rotting wood.

green@village.title: The Village Green
green@village.description:
You are standing on a square of grass in the center of the village.  A road
leads east into the rest of the village.
   To the north is a small church, and a path leads west into the trees.

passage@village.title: Passage End
passage@village.description:
The passage here ends with a blank stone wall, possibly foundations to a
building.  Above you is a set of floorboards.

road5@village.title: Main Street
road5@village.description:
The newly built main street might well become the main street of the town. 
This part of it heads north-south. To the west is a saloon. Looks like a pretty
mean place to go.

road10@village.title: Main Street
road10@village.description:
This is the northern end of main street. There are a few houses around
here.  A wagon trail leads north out of town.  A small garden in front of
one of those houses is east.

track@village.title: Village Track
track@village.description:
You are following a path which leads east through the village towards the
sea.  To the west a few buildings are clustered around the village green, while
to the east the village becomes a collection of small houses and narrow
streets.  A small path leads to the north.

cave@village.title: Sea Cave
cave@village.description:
You are standing in a low, reasonably dry sea cave.  The cave echoes the
gentle pounding of the waves on the sandy beach to the east.  A single narrow
passage leads west into darkness.

villstudy@village.title: Sam's Gym and Workout
villstudy@village.description:
Well here is the gym.  Bodybuilders at work.  Lots of strange machines.
Some people seem to be working on exercises that will let them build their
strength build slowly over time.

hospital@village.title: The Village Hospital
hospital@village.description:
You are in the waiting room of the hospital.  On the south wall is a
door with a sign reading "Emergency" above it.  From the sounds coming from
within, it seems as if the doctors are frantically trying to save someone.
Sitting in the corner is a rather expensive looking machine that
goes...&+YPING&*

well1@village.title: Down The Well
well1@village.description: You slip and lose your grip, then plunge helplessly into the waters below...

shed@village.title: Rotting Boat Shed
shed@village.description:
As you enter the smell of old, rotting mouldy wood surrounds you. The shed
is cluttered with old broken boats, fishing nets and other useless rubbish.

road3@village.title: Village Road
road3@village.description:
You are follow a narrow street of the village which leads north and south.
This road looks to have been constructed more recently than the old main
street of the village.  To the east looks like a day care center.

tunnel@village.title: Narrow Tunnel
tunnel@village.description:
You are squeezing down a narrow dirt tunnel, quite crudely dug, and
supported with old ships timbers.  The tunnel leads westwards towards a faint
light, or descends steeply to the east.

steps@village.title: Cellar Steps
steps@village.description:
You are standing on the narrow, precarious steps which lead down into the
cellars of the inn.  A pale shaft of light shines down from the top of the
steps, revealing the cellars below.

dirt@village.title: Dirt Tunnel
dirt@village.description:
You are clambering along a low dirt tunnel which leads east and west.
A wider tunnel joins from the north.

road6@village.title: Main Street
road6@village.description:
The newly built main street might well become the main street of the town. 
This part of it heads east-west. To the north is a saloon. Looks like a pretty
mean place to go.

store@village.title: General Store
store@village.description:
The store is packed tight with shelves containing various items
that towns people would need for there every day lives. But not a lot of
good to a seasoned adventurer like you. There is a small bakery over
by the southern wall, opposite the counter where you would pay for the 
items you wanted.

emergency@village.title: The Emergency Room
emergency@village.description:
This is a busy area with many doctors frantically running around to save
patients.  There are about 32 beds here, all with seperate sets of machines;
some of these go BLIP-BLIP, others have red and green flashing lights, and
the remaining ones are some sort of measurement of your vitality.

saloon1@village.title: The Bar
saloon1@village.description:
A smoke filled saloon is filled with people. Looking around you see
several tables, and a bar toward the north. There are exits back into
the fresh air outside, heading both south and east.

road9@village.title: Main Street
road9@village.description:
Standing near the northern end of main street, you can see
a general store on the eastern side of the road. While on the west
there is a strange looking little shop.

weaponshop@village.title: Weapons Shop
weaponshop@village.description:
This store has been abandoned for some time. The cob webs have built 
up across the single room shop. There are several tables, and in the
back you notice an old forge. Unused for a long time.

armorer@village.name: armorer
armorer@village.description: A bulky armorer stands before you.

barman@village.name: barman
barman@village.description: A barman is here serving drinks.

kenny@village.name: kenny
kenny@village.description: Kenny stands here in a bright orange jacket.

locksmith@village.name: locksmith
locksmith@village.description: A crazy-looking man stands here looking at you.

drunk1@village.name: drunk1
drunk1@village.description: A drunken teenager stumbles around in front of you, looking for a fight.

drunk2@village.name: drunk2
drunk2@village.description: A drunk stumbles around in front of you.

professor@village.name: Professor
professor@village.description: A crazed CIS professor stands here, threatening you with homework.

bankteller@village.name: bankteller
bankteller@village.description: A bank teller waits here patiently.

baker@village.name: baker
baker@village.description: A tall, thin baker stands here.

bankmanager@village.name: bankmanager
bankmanager@village.description: A chubby bank manager stands here wearing a suit.

bankguard@village.name: bankguard
bankguard@village.description: The bank's security guard stands here.

child@village.name: child
child@village.description: A small child looks very lost.

lady@village.name: lady
lady@village.description: A lady stands here looking around for something.
